SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CodeStubs
 
ConfigFileParser
An implementation of the interface Parser, the role of ConfigFileParser is to provide methods that can configure the files needed to build a word/definition/pages index.
ConsoleColour
 
FileParser
This interface should be implemented by a class that parses a file.
IndexBuilder
 
IndexExtraOptions
A class which needs a word/definition index to be used, and provides extra options for manipulating the index such as getting N most frequent/infrequent words or searching for a specific word in the index.
IndexFileWriter
This class provides a method for writing the index hashmap to a file.
Menu
Provides the application with menu functionality by exposing several methods that take the user's choice, it then delegates the job depending on which choice is selected.
Runner
The class Runner is a basic class that implements a main method which starts the application.
TextFileParser
This class offers methods responsible for parsing a text file and it delegates the responsibilty of building an index to a class called IndexBuilder, as a result it depends on an IndexBuilder to work properly./p>
TextualGUI
 
WordDetail
WordDetail is a class which is used to store data about a word, including the actual word name, definition and pages it exists on, stored in a collection.
